commit.message:
Auto merge of #25161 - jooert:moretests, r=alexcrichton

The last one (at least for the moment :smiley:).

r? @alexcrichton

files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,8 @@
+-include ../tools.mk
+
+# Test output to be four
+# The original error only occurred when printing, not when comparing using assert!
+
+all:
+	$(RUSTC) foo.rs -O
+	[ `$(call RUN,foo)` = "4" ]
